showcase.title: Relocate smarter, live better.
showcase.para: Your AI-powered platform for seamless relocation, legal guidance, and global living.

settings.addBio: Add a bio to tell your story.
settings.confirmAccountDeleteDesc: Before you delete your account, please take a moment to understand what will happen to your data:
settings.confirmDeleteWarning: Keep in mind that deleting your account can't be undone.
settings.confirmDeleteList1: Your profile details, preferences, and settings will be removed.
settings.confirmDeleteList2: All data will be permanently deleted 30 days after account deletion.
